help.name: search for substructure instances of
help.command: search for substructure instances of '<smiles_string>' [save as '<csv_file_name>']
help.description:
This command searches for molecules with the instance of a molecule in their substructure, as defined in the <smiles_string> string. 
If you use the <cmd>SAVE AS</cmd> clause, it will save a csv file to the current workspace.

 For example: <cmd> search for substructure instances of 'C1(C(=C)C([O-])C1C)=O' save as 'my_mol'</cmd>
